title: League of Legends Gift Card Problems!!!
body: I bought a league of legends gift card (10) but it doesn't work. It's because it's only for NA and my account is on EUW. Can a riot employee give me back the rp? I can show the gift card code for proof.

replies.body: RP cards are specific to the region it was intended for so, an NA card won't work for EUW.  Reach out to us in a [support ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new), and our billing team can take a look.  Hopefully we can help out with this!
